Your babyâ€™s heartbeat can be 
heard through a stethoscope. 
Later, your partner may be able 
to hear the heartbeat by putting 
their ear to your abdomen, but it 
can	be	difficult	to	find	the	right	
place. Your baby is now covered 
in a white, greasy substance 
called vernix. It is thought that 
this may be to protect its skin 
as	it	floats	in	the	amniotic	fluid.
